description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget called `NoteEditor` which provides a user interface for creating, editing, and deleting notes with associated tags. It interacts with `NotesProvider` and `TagsProvider` for state management and performs operations such as saving, deleting, and managing note tags.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a form-based UI for creating or editing a note with tags. Supports saving, deleting, and managing tags associated with a note.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes controllers and selected tags based on whether editing an existing note or creating a new one.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of text controllers to free resources.

methods.name: _saveNote
methods.description: Validates input and calls provider methods to save or update the note, then refreshes tags and navigates back.

methods.name: _deleteNote
methods.description: Confirms and deletes the current note through provider methods, then refreshes tags and navigates back.

methods.name: _addTag
methods.description: Adds a new tag to the selected tags list if it doesn't already exist.

methods.name: _removeTag
methods.description: Removes a specified tag from the selected tags list.
